p: The molecular mechanism of botanical EOs pesticides and their mode of action was evaluated by studying the transcriptional expression levels for proteasome subunit alpha type-5 (CL8), arylalkylamine N-acetyltransferase (CL1294), and cytochrome (CYP 4Q4) gene in S. oryzae adult to the applied essential oils using the quantitative real-time polymerase chain reaction (qRT-PCR) analysis.
